name: The Child and I
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2022 with a few friends, The Child and I is the story of a monster and a child escaping from a mysterious facility.

The Monster moves with the Arrow Keys

The Child moves with WASD

The Spacebar passes the ball between them.

Credits:

Team Lead: Ben McDowell

Team Lead: Matt Wiltzius

Team Lead: Walter Verburg

Team Lead: Wolf Beck
